channel.title: HOW DO I GET NPCS TO TRADE? EX. SANTA WON'T TRADE the items i put in
channel.description: the title says it all im stuck on this and i need help. any1 plz

item.title: HOW DO I GET NPCS TO TRADE? EX. SANTA WON'T TRADE the items i put in
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Go to cleint.java and search for this…

else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop

And after that add this…

} else if (NPCID == 1699) { //Rare Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; //ghost

Just change (npcid == 1699) to the npc id and change the 44 to the shop number and most likely your going to change ghost to santa.

Read full topic
item.source: HOW DO I GET NPCS TO TRADE? EX. SANTA WON'T TRADE the items i put in
